mapper.sql:
WHERE 1=1
AND a.TITLE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword}),'%')
AND a.CONTENT LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword}),'%')
AND ( a.TITLE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword}),'%') OR a.CONTENT LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword}),'%') OR a.SUBTITLE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword}),'%') OR a.SUMMARY LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword}),'%') OR a.AUTHOR LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword}),'%') )

ORDER BY
a.SEQ a.TITLE a.SUBTITLE a.SUMMARY a.CONTENT a.AUTHOR a.REG_DATE
a.REG_DATE DESC, a.SEQ
ASC DESC DESC
mapper.select:
SELECT x.* , b.SEQ AS FILE_SEQ , b.NAME , b.CATEGORY , b.PATH FROM ( SELECT a.SEQ , a.TITLE , a.SUBTITLE , a.SUMMARY , a.CONTENT , a.AUTHOR , a.REG_DATE FROM BOARD a
) x LEFT JOIN FILE b ON x.SEQ = b.OWNER_SEQ AND b.SEQ = (SELECT MAX(SEQ) FROM FILE WHERE OWNER_SEQ = x.SEQ)

SELECT a.SEQ , a.TITLE , a.SUBTITLE , a.TITLE , a.SUMMARY , a.CONTENT , a.AUTHOR , a.REG_DATE , b.SEQ AS FILE_SEQ , b.NAME , b.CATEGORY , b.PATH FROM BOARD a LEFT JOIN FILE b ON a.SEQ = b.OWNER_SEQ AND b.SEQ = (SELECT MAX(SEQ) FROM FILE WHERE OWNER_SEQ = a.SEQ) WHERE a.SEQ = #{seq}
